properties.Name: Victoria International Marina
properties.Details: For marina customers only, sometimes make arrangements with commercial vessels.

properties.Name: Greater Victoria Harbour Authority
properties.Details: Located on Finger B at Fisherman's Wharf, payment is only through visa and must be tap. GVHA also offers mobile pump out service for long term moorage customers at the marinas. The pumpout is self operated.

properties.Name: Port Sidney Marina
properties.Details: Should be up and running very soon, some minor repairs have to be done first, only for vessels 40 ft and under.

properties.Name: Ganges Coast Guard Dock
properties.Details: Self serve, $10 gets you 7 minutes of pumping.

properties.Name: Greater Victoria Habour Authority
properties.Details: On Wednesdays they have a mobile service.
